scripts.patch: if yarn test; then yarn version --patch; ./node_modules/.bin/ncp; fi
scripts.minor: if yarn test; then yarn version --minor; ./node_modules/.bin/ncp; fi
scripts.major: if yarn test; then yarn version --major; ./node_modules/.bin/ncp; fi
scripts.deploy: if yarn test; then yarn version; ./node_modules/.bin/ncp; fi
